FuncDef: This command configures ingress VLAN translation. If enabled with an explicit VLAN value, the preserved VLAN id will be overwritten with this value. This setting is applicable to dot1q encapsulated ports. If enabled with the copy-outer keyword, the outer VLAN id will be copied to inner position on QinQ encapsulated ports. The feature is not supported on:

ParaDef.Info: Specifies the VLAN id. Values-0 to 4094.
Specifies to use the outer VLAN id.
